## RTCEngine.on() method

监听对应的事件，支持多次调用同一事件

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static on<event extends keyof QNRTCEngineEvent>(name: event, listener: QNRTCEngineEvent[event]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | event | 事件名 |
|  listener | [QNRTCEngineEvent](./qnrtc-uniapp-sdk.qnrtcengineevent.md)<!-- -->\[event\] | 事件句柄 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
